document_notes.text:
This update for samba fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-1615: Fixed error handling in random number generation (bso#15103)(bsc#1202976).
- CVE-2022-32743: Implement validated dnsHostName write rights (bso#14833)(bsc#1202803).

Bugfixes:

- Fixed use after free when iterating smbd_server_connection->connections after tree disconnect failure (bso#15128)(bsc#1200102).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: In Samba, GnuTLS gnutls_rnd() can fail and give predictable random values.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.text: Samba does not validate the Validated-DNS-Host-Name right for the dNSHostName attribute which could permit unprivileged users to write it.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
